name: JFormBuilder
short_description: JFormBuilder is a tool that intends to help developers with user interface (UI) fragment development. In fact it attempts to reduce this task to minimum development and maintenance efforts. You are probably concerned that JFormBuiler is a one use tool to drag and drop component that will sooner or later became out of sync with your backend part of application. The main reason why to use JFormBuilder is that you will not need to synchronize UI fragment anymore you will not more need to spend time with tedious and error-prone form or table development. JFormBuilder inspects the backed part of your application and looks for information that should we used and applied in UI fragments. This way a simple change of the backend part does not break the UI part. All changes are continuously applied to your user interface.  JFormBuilder allows you to define your own UI widgets as templates and to annotate were should the meta information apply...
summary: Automated UI generation via code inspection of J2EE
